title: MahaRakshak: Real-Time COVID-19 Tracking for Maharashtra
narration: Introducing MahaRakshak a webbased platform designed to track and monitor suspected COVIDnineteen cases in realtime across Maharashtra. This innovative platform addresses the urgent need for proactive surveillance amid rising case numbers providing a focused solution for early detection and containment.

title: The Need for MahaRakshak
content:
Surge of one hundred fifty-four new COVID-nineteen cases since May nineteenth, two thousand twenty-five.
Proactive surveillance is crucial for early detection.
Focused solution for containment in Maharashtra.
image_desc: Doctor examining patient. Type: stock photo
narration: In response to the recent surge of one hundred fiftyfour new COVIDnineteen cases since May nineteenth two thousand twentyfive as reported by the Ministry of Health and Family Welfare MahaRakshak offers a focused solution for early detection and containment. This highlights the critical need for a system like MahaRakshak to proactively manage and mitigate the spread of the virus.

title: How MahaRakshak is Different
content:
Hyperlocal Focus: District and taluka-level data.
Public Participation: Community-driven suspect tracking.
Web-First: No app installation needed.
Modular Architecture: Easily extendable with new features.
image_desc: Map of Maharashtra highlighting districts. Type: map
narration: MahaRakshak distinguishes itself through several key features. It has a hyperlocal focus zooming in on Maharashtra's district and talukalevel data unlike nationallevel apps. It also encourages communitydriven suspect tracking not just clinical case recording. Being webfirst and deviceagnostic it requires no app installation and runs smoothly on any browser even lowend smartphones. Its modular architecture allows easy extension with features like vaccination alerts and AI prediction.

title: Problem Solving with MahaRakshak
content:
Real-time self-reporting of symptoms.
Early tracking of suspect trends.
Prevention through hotspot notifications.
Reduced burden on clinics and call centers.
image_desc: Person using a smartphone for health tracking. Type: stock photo
narration: MahaRakshak effectively solves several critical problems. It enables realtime selfreporting of symptoms reducing reporting delays. It helps health officials track suspect trends early even before testing confirmation. The platform prevents spread by notifying users near emerging hotspots allowing them to take precautions. Furthermore it reduces the burden on clinics and call centers by letting users selfassess and track their health status digitally.

title: Unique Selling Proposition
content:
Localized + Inclusive: Marathi-English format.
Real-Time, Community-Enabled: Empowers citizens and health workers.
Built for Action: Decision-making tool and alert system.
Future-Ready: Supports AI, vaccination tracking, and travel pass integration.
image_desc: People working together on a digital platform. Type: illustration
narration: MahaRakshak's unique selling proposition lies in its localized and inclusive design offering a MarathiEnglish format. It's realtime and communityenabled harnessing public data to empower both citizens and health workers. Built for action it serves as a decisionmaking tool for authorities and an alert system for citizens. Its futureready modular design supports AIbased risk prediction vaccination tracking and travel pass integration.

title: Frontend Technologies
content:
**Core Technologies**
React.js
Tailwind CSS
Translation.js (Multilingual support)
**Mapping & Visualization**
Leaflet.js or Mapbox GL JS (Interactive maps)
Chart.js (Trends in reported cases)
image_desc: React, Tailwind CSS, and Javascript logos. Type: logo collage
narration: The frontend of MahaRakshak is built using cuttingedge technologies. React.js provides a dynamic user interface while Tailwind CSS ensures a responsive and visually appealing design. Translation.js offers multilingual support. Interactive maps are created using Leaflet.js or Mapbox GL JS to show suspect zones and Chart.js visualizes trends in reported cases.

title: Backend Technologies
content:
**Backend**
Node.js + Express.js (lightweight and easy to set up)
RESTful API (data exchange)
**Database**
Firebase Realtime Database
OR
MongoDB with Mongoose
image_desc: Node.js, Express.js, Firebase and MongoDB logos. Type: logo collage
narration: The backend of MahaRakshak is powered by Node.js and Express.js providing a lightweight and easytosetup environment. A RESTful API facilitates seamless data exchange between the frontend and backend. For the database the platform uses Firebase Realtime Database for realtime data syncing or MongoDB with Mongoose for more control and custom querying.

title: Authentication and Hosting
content:
**Authentication**
Firebase Auth (Google login, email/password, OTP)
**Hosting & Deployment**
Frontend: Vercel (GitHub-linked deployment)
Backend: Render (Node.js hosting)
Database: Firebase (hosted and managed)
image_desc: Firebase Authentication, Vercel, and Render logos. Type: logo collage
narration: Authentication is handled by Firebase Auth offering simple implementation and support for Google login emailpassword and OTP. For hosting and deployment the frontend is deployed using Vercel with GitHublinked deployment. The backend is hosted on Render providing easy Node.js hosting. The database is hosted and managed by Firebase requiring no setup.

title: Scalability of MahaRakshak
content:
Web-based: Works on any device, including low-end smartphones.
Focused on Maharashtra: Precise, local data tracking.
Modular design: Easy addition of new features.
Quick deployment: Expandable across regions without heavy infrastructure.
image_desc: Smartphone displaying a web application. Type: stock photo
narration: MahaRakshak is designed for scalability. Being webbased it requires no app installation and works on any device including lowend smartphones. Its focus on Maharashtra's district and taluka levels ensures precise local data tracking. The modular design allows for easy addition of features like vaccination alerts and AI risk prediction. It's quick to deploy and expand across regions without heavy infrastructure.

title: Real World Impact - Early Warning System
content:
Detects cases before confirmation.
Enables faster response.
image_desc: Alert notification on a smartphone. Type: screenshot
narration: MahaRakshak acts as an early warning system by detecting cases before confirmation enabling a faster response to potential outbreaks. This proactive approach allows health officials and citizens to take necessary precautions sooner mitigating the spread of the virus more effectively.

title: Real World Impact - Citizen Empowerment & Health System Support
content:
Empowers citizens: Boosts awareness and reporting.
Eases health system load: Reduces clinic rush and call volume.
image_desc: Community members discussing health information. Type: stock photo
narration: MahaRakshak empowers citizens by turning them into first responders boosting awareness and reporting of potential cases. This increased public participation eases the load on the health system by allowing users to selfassess reducing clinic rush and call volume thereby optimizing resource allocation.

title: Real World Impact - Saving Lives & Smart Governance
content:
Saves lives: Sends hotspot alerts.
Drives smart governance: Provides live data for quick action.
image_desc: Health officials analyzing data on a screen. Type: stock photo
narration: MahaRakshak saves lives by sending hotspot alerts helping people stay safe in realtime. It drives smart governance by providing health officials with live data to act quickly and effectively enabling informed decisionmaking and targeted interventions to control the spread of COVIDnineteen.

title: MahaRakshak: Built for Maharashtra, Ready to Scale
content: 🛡️ Built for Maharashtra. Ready to scale.
image_desc: Maharashtra state map with a shield icon. Type: illustration
narration: MahaRakshak is built specifically for Maharashtra addressing the unique needs of the region. Its scalable architecture and design make it ready to expand and adapt to future challenges ensuring longterm effectiveness in managing public health crises.
